name: Road to Recolory
description:
Road to Recolory is an isometric, rogue like, dungeon crawler that will challenge a player’s resiliency in a way that both informs them of the challenges of grief as well as the benefits of seeking help. This game will require the player to defeat various enemies and solve intricate puzzles while traversing levels inspired by the various stages of grief.

Quinnipiac GDD Senior Project by:

Alex Hartman: Creative Director, Designer, Programmer.

Andrew Fulop: Designer, Programmer, Project Manager

Chad Reilly: Art Director, PR Director, Designer
